category.name: Design
category.description: Master design principles, user experience, and visual communication techniques.

sub_categories.name: UI/UX Design
sub_categories.description: Learn user interface and user experience design principles and best practices.

exercises.title: Design Fundamentals
exercises.description: Learn fundamental design principles and concepts.

tasks.title: Visual Hierarchy
tasks.question:
What is visual hierarchy in design?

Consider: How elements are organized to guide user attention
tasks.hint: Think about the order of importance in visual elements
options: Organizing elements to show importance and guide user attention

tasks.title: Color Theory
tasks.question:
What are complementary colors?

Consider: Color relationships on the color wheel
tasks.hint: Think about colors that are opposite each other
options: Colors that are next to each other
Colors that are opposite each other on the color wheel
Colors that are the same shade

tasks.title: Typography
tasks.question:
What is the purpose of typography in design?

Consider: How text affects readability and communication
tasks.hint: Think about making text readable and visually appealing
options: To use as many fonts as possible
To make text readable, legible, and visually appealing
To make text as small as possible

exercises.title: User Experience Basics
exercises.description: Learn fundamental user experience concepts and principles.

tasks.title: User-Centered Design
tasks.question:
What is user-centered design?

Consider: Who the design process focuses on
tasks.hint: Think about putting users at the center of the design process
options: Designing with users' needs and preferences as the primary focus

tasks.title: Usability
tasks.question:
What is usability in UX design?

Consider: How easy something is to use
tasks.hint: Think about effectiveness, efficiency, and satisfaction
options: How easy and effective something is to use

tasks.title: User Journey
tasks.question:
What is a user journey map?

Consider: The path a user takes through an experience
tasks.hint: Think about mapping out user interactions and emotions
options: A visualization of user interactions and emotions throughout an experience
